short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens Google Docs/Meet/Drive links using the correct Google account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Must have plugin for anybody using 2+ Google accounts daily.

Open all your Google docs, sheets, slides, and meets with the correct Google account every time. Keep your personal account, work account, and any other Google account all separate, and edit docs with the right account every. single. time. 

If you want to make sure you click on a Google drive link and it opens with the account that actually has permission to open it instead of some other random Google account you have in your browser, just install the plugin, set your default account (it will open with this account when no other account has specific access) and forget about it.

For any bugs, issues, recommendations about new features, please email ryansplugins@gmail.com and let me know. I'll read your email and fix the problem :)
